column4: Hello, I've been trying to allow myself to run an program without sudo, I've tried using the visudo file and inputing the line "username ALL = (root) NOPASSWD:/usr/bin/program" where username is my username and program is the program, yet I still have sudo asking me for a password.
Its one program. I know what Im doing. Trust me.
then do it, if you know what you are doing, but don't come asking for support
